title: Do people really believe in an American empire? - Quora

response.answer_text: Yea we do. When there is trouble who do all those country ask for help USA. When Somali is starving again from war lords starving their people? Who do they call? America. The Paris climate accord sucked millions from who? America. The UN has expensive valuable real estate on New York’s fifth avenue provided by who? Europe? No America. WHO gets millions where from America. 20 fricking percent of their budget came from where America. And the UN 22 percent. When almost one quarter of the support for these charities comes from America, sigh we’re an empire of givers

The American Empire really does exist with hundreds of overseas US military bases. But like the British Empire and its overseas colonies which fell over time, the American Empire will fall when all of ts overseas military bases retract and close.
